question: I am allowed to pray qasr? Which is my watan e asli?...university is 68 miles from my house and I returned every 2 weeks
answer:
QUESTION
I am a student at university. The university is 68 miles from my house and I returned every 2 weeks to my home. I therefore prayed qasr salaah. However, my family has bought a house for me to live in. I?m still return home after 2 weeks so
ANSWER


Share:
If you live at your university home for lesser than two weeks, then you will be a Musaafir and you have to make Qasr there.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
